Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-07-11T15:26:11Describing Archives: A Content Standard
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection
Archives of Irish America
AIA.053
0.5 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box and 1 oversize folder in shared housing
circa 1920-2008 This is an artifical collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The collection consists of a variety of photographs, many of which document sporting events, musical performances, and social functions organized by various Irish American social or fraternal organizations in the greater New York City area. Materials are in English.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received.
Historical/Biographical Note
The Archives of Irish America, a special collection documenting the the Irish migration experience and American Irish ethnicity in the 20th century, accumulated these photographs via active collection by staff, contributions from donors and from material removed from collections in the Archives.
Custodial History
The Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection is an artificial collection created via active collection by staff, contributions from donors and from material removed from collections in the Archives. There is no documentation or accession information about the origin of the materials in this collection.
Scope and Content Note
This is an artifical collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The collection consists of a variety of photographs, many of which document sporting events, musical performances, and social functions organized by various Irish American social or fraternal organizations in the greater New York City area.
Use Restrictions
The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 2128. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.
Access Restrictions
Open for research without restrictions.
Related Archival Materials
Archives of Irish America County Societies Collection (AIA 003)
Archives of Irish America Manuscript Collection (AIA 006)
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection; AIA 053; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Rolled panoramas have been removed from the open collection pending conservation treatment and are unavailable to researchers.
